These Pictures Of Yami Gautam Prove Why She Is One Of The Most Beautiful Actress In Bollywood
These Pictures Of Yami Gautam Prove Why She Is One Of The Most Beautiful Actress In Bollywood
Yami Gautam is an Indian film actress and model who has carved a niche for herself in Bollywood. She has also appeared in a few Telugu, Kannada, Punjabi, Malayalam and Tamil films. She is a prominent celebrity endorser for brands and products. Her acting skills in several films were appreciaated by fans and critics alike. She received IIFA - Star Debut of the Year Award and Zee Cine - Best Female Debut Award for her film Vicky Donor.
She has acted in Total Siyappa and Action Jackson in 2014 and, Badlapur in 2015 against Varun Dhawan. All these movies performed well at the box office and also earned her plaudits. She has also acted in Telugu Movie Courier Boy Kalyan and Tamil movie Tamilselvanum Thaniyar Anjalum. She recently was part of the superhit Bollywood film "Uri - The Surgical Strike". The movie has garnered immense praise across all quarters and has also made remarkable money.
